actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Porter County Plumbing, Heating and Electric Company.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named company in full settlement of all claims arising out of decisions made by the Departments of Labor and Housing and Urban Development requiring such company to make certain wage restitution payments for work done on a housing project.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Porter County Plumbing, Heating and Electric Company.
